name: AYE, ROWBOAT
description:
The treasure is waiting for you at the finish line. Do you have what it takes?  Will your raft hold up?  Find your true inner self in this thrilling race upon the oceans. 

Please use xbox-controllers, otherwise it will be 30% as fun.

Game Made by: 

Niklas Ström - @salkinitzor
Henrik Johansson - @mediocrehenrik
Mads Johansen Lassen - @pyjamads
